content.data:
Create an Applied Door Molding Material in the Material Manager. 
 
 
 Take that Material to Properties then run the Profile Editor and give it the shape you need. 
 
 
 In a Door Material Schedule assign your new Applied Door Molding to the "Applied Inside Edge Molding" Part. 
 
 
 In a Job use that Door Material Schedule on a Door that is using an Inside Edge Profile.

Take that Material to Properties then run the Profile Editor and give it the shape you need.

In a Door Material Schedule assign your new Applied Door Molding to the "Applied Inside Edge Molding" Part.
In a Door Material Schedule assign your new Applied Door Molding to the "Applied Inside Edge Molding" Part.
In a Job use that Door Material Schedule on a Door that is using an Inside Edge Profile.
In a Job use that Door Material Schedule on a Door that is using an Inside Edge Profile.
You should see your Applied Door Molding.
